49 // Declaration of the stencil class
50 namespace bitpit {
51 
59 template <typename weight_t>
60 class DiscreteStencil {
61 
62 template<typename U>
63 friend bitpit::OBinaryStream & (::operator<<) (bitpit::OBinaryStream &buffer, const DiscreteStencil<U> &stencil);
64 template<typename U>
65 friend bitpit::IBinaryStream & (::operator>>) (bitpit::IBinaryStream &buffer, DiscreteStencil<U> &stencil);
66 
67 public:
68  long NULL_ID = - std::numeric_limits<long>::max();
69 
70  typedef weight_t weight_type;
71 
75  struct item_type {
76  long id;
77  weight_type weight;
78  };
79 
80  DiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
81  DiscreteStencil(std::size_t nItems, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
82  DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
83  DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
84 
85  void initialize(std::size_t nItems, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
86  void initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
87  void initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero = weight_t());
88  void initialize(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
89 
90  void clear(bool release = false);
91 
92  std::size_t size() const;
93 
94  void resize(std::size_t nItems);
95  void reserve(std::size_t nItems);
96 
97  long & getPattern(std::size_t pos);
98  const long & getPattern(std::size_t pos) const;
99  long * patternData();
100  const long * patternData() const;
101  void setPattern(std::size_t pos, long id);
102 
103  weight_t & getWeight(std::size_t pos);
104  const weight_t & getWeight(std::size_t pos) const;
105  weight_t * weightData();
106  const weight_t * weightData() const;
107  void setWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &weight);
108  void setWeight(std::size_t pos, weight_t &&weight);
109  void sumWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &value);
110  void zeroWeight(std::size_t pos);
111 
112  void setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, const weight_t &weight);
113  void setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, weight_t &&weight);
114  void sumItem(long id, const weight_t &value);
115  void appendItem(long id, const weight_t &weight);
116  void appendItem(long id, weight_t &&weight);
117 
118  weight_t & getConstant();
119  const weight_t & getConstant() const;
120  void setConstant(const weight_t &value);
121  void setConstant(weight_t &&value);
122  void sumConstant(const weight_t &value);
123  void zeroConstant();
124 
125  void optimize(double tolerance = 1.e-12);
126  void renumber(const std::unordered_map<long, long> &map);
127  void addComplementToZero(long id);
128  void zero();
129 
130  void display(std::ostream &out, double factor = 1.) const;
131 
132  size_t getBinarySize() const;
133 
134  DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator*=(double factor);
135  DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator/=(double factor);
136  DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator+=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
137  DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & operator-=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other);
138 
139 private:
140  static void rawCopyValue(const weight_t &source, weight_t *destination);
141  static void rawMoveValue(weight_t &&source, weight_t *destination);
142 
143  weight_t m_zero;
144  std::vector<long> m_pattern;
145  std::vector<weight_t> m_weights;
146  weight_t m_constant;
147 
148  weight_t * findWeight(long id);
149  const weight_t * findWeight(long id) const;
150 
151  bool optimizeWeight(std::size_t pos, double tolerance = 1.e-12);
152 
153 };
154

164

166 bool DiscreteStencil<std::vector<double>>::optimizeWeight(std::size_t pos, double tolerance);
167 
168 }
